creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: Vase with white ground with rust and black colored designs; scalloped rim painted rust; rust colored floral designs throughout; 6 rust colored bird are paint below the rim; a ram, moose, and deer with rust colored arrows (heart lines) from mouth to body are painter ad the shoulder of the vase; 3 bears with rust colored arrows (heart lines) are painted near the base of the vase.
markings:
Acoma, NM
M. Antonio on bottom of vase
title: Acoma vase
